summary: Simple mod to increase the draw speed of Daedric bows
descriptionHtml:
I thought that the draw speed for a Daedric bows was horrifically slow compared to bound bows. This is an incredibly simple mod that increases the draw speed of Daedric bows from 0.5 to 1 so that players who've leveled smithing/enchanting don't have to feel like their efforts were wasted. 

Should be compatible with all other mods except those that modify draw speeds or the functionality of the Daedric bow.
author: MathiusKain
